description: The FlexUSB is the ideal solution for connecting your USB devices to your laptop, PC, or Mac®. Use it with portable USB storage devices, CD/ DVD drives, MP3 players, wireless devices, external input, mice etc. Laptop work areas often have limited space such as airline tray tables, small coffee shop tables, or a person's lap. All these scenarios limit the user's ability to effectively connect one or more USB devices.With the FlexUSB adapter, you no longer need to worry about inconvenient locations or awkward orientation of your USB ports. This patented flexible adapter allows USB devices to plug into an open USB port from any angle. With +/- 90° horizontal and vertical hinges, you can connect your USB devices in a position most convenient for you. Ratcheting positions provide stability to hold the adapter in the position you desire. Get your FlexUSB adapter today and be on your way to simplifying your connections!Connector 1: (1) USB-A MaleConnector 2: (1) USB-A Female
title: C2G / Cables to Go 30501 FlexUSB USB 2.0 A Male to A Female Adapter (Black)
